   19: -module(ssl_session_ticket_SUITE).
   20: 
   21: -behaviour(ct_suite).

   23: %% Callback functions
   24: -export([all/0,
   25:          groups/0,
   26:          init_per_suite/1,
   27:          end_per_suite/1,
   28:          init_per_group/2,
   29:          end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2,
   31:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   32: 
   33: %% Testcases
   34: -export([basic/0,
   35:          basic/1,
   36:          ticketage_smaller_than_windowsize_anti_replay/0,
   37:          ticketage_smaller_than_windowsize_anti_replay/1,
   38:          ticketage_bigger_than_windowsize_anti_replay/0,
   39:          ticketage_bigger_than_windowsize_anti_replay/1,
   40:          ticketage_out_of_lifetime_anti_replay/0,
   41:          ticketage_out_of_lifetime_anti_replay/1,
   42:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay/0,
   43:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay/1,
   44:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart/0,
   45:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart/1,
   46:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart_reused_seed/0,
   47:          ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart_reused_seed/1,
   48:          basic_stateful_stateless/0,
   49:          basic_stateful_stateless/1,
   50:          basic_stateless_stateful/0,
   51:          basic_stateless_stateful/1,
   52:          basic_stateful_stateless_anti_replay/0,
   53:          basic_stateful_stateless_anti_replay/1,
   54:          basic_stateless_stateful_anti_replay/0,
   55:          basic_stateless_stateful_anti_replay/1,
   56:          basic_stateful_stateless_faulty_ticket/0,
   57:          basic_stateful_stateless_faulty_ticket/1,
   58:          basic_stateless_stateful_faulty_ticket/0,
   59:          basic_stateless_stateful_faulty_ticket/1,
   60:          hello_retry_request/0,
   61:          hello_retry_request/1,
   62:          multiple_tickets/0,
   63:          multiple_tickets/1,
   64:          multiple_tickets_2hash/0,
   65:          multiple_tickets_2hash/1,
   66:          early_data_client_too_much_data/0,
   67:          early_data_client_too_much_data/1,
   68:          early_data_trial_decryption/0,
   69:          early_data_trial_decryption/1,
   70:          early_data_trial_decryption_failure/0,
   71:          early_data_trial_decryption_failure/1,
   72:          early_data_decryption_failure/0,
   73:          early_data_decryption_failure/1,
   74:          early_data_disabled_small_limit/0,
   75:          early_data_disabled_small_limit/1,
   76:          early_data_enabled_small_limit/0,
   77:          early_data_enabled_small_limit/1,
   78:          early_data_basic/0,
   79:          early_data_basic/1,
   80:          early_data_basic_auth/0,
   81:          early_data_basic_auth/1,
   82:          stateless_multiple_servers/0,
   83:          stateless_multiple_servers/1]).
   84: 
   85: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   86: -include("tls_handshake.hrl").
   87: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   88: 
   89: -define(SLEEP, 500).
   90: 
   91: 
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: all() ->
   96:     [
   97:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'}
   98:     ].
   99: 
  100: groups() ->
  101:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], [{group, stateful},
  102:                       {group, stateless},
  103:                       {group, stateful_with_cert},
  104:                       {group, stateless_with_cert},
  105:                       {group, mixed}]},
  106:      {stateful, [], session_tests()},
  107:      {stateless, [], session_tests() ++ anti_replay_tests()},
  108:      {stateful_with_cert, [], session_tests()},
  109:      {stateless_with_cert, [], session_tests() ++ anti_replay_tests()},
  110:      {mixed, [], mixed_tests()}].
  111: 
  112: session_tests() ->
  113:     [basic,
  114:      hello_retry_request,
  115:      multiple_tickets,
  116:      multiple_tickets_2hash,
  117:      early_data_client_too_much_data,
  118:      early_data_trial_decryption,
  119:      early_data_trial_decryption_failure,
  120:      early_data_decryption_failure,
  121:      early_data_disabled_small_limit,
  122:      early_data_enabled_small_limit,
  123:      early_data_basic,
  124:      early_data_basic_auth].
  125: 
  126: anti_replay_tests() ->
  127:     [
  128:      ticketage_smaller_than_windowsize_anti_replay,
  129:      ticketage_bigger_than_windowsize_anti_replay,
  130:      ticketage_out_of_lifetime_anti_replay, ticket_reuse_anti_replay,
  131:      ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart,
  132:      ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart_reused_seed,
  133:      stateless_multiple_servers
  134:     ].
  135: 
  136: mixed_tests() ->
  137:     [
  138:      basic_stateful_stateless,
  139:      basic_stateless_stateful,
  140:      basic_stateful_stateless_anti_replay,
  141:      basic_stateless_stateful_anti_replay,
  142:      basic_stateful_stateless_faulty_ticket,
  143:      basic_stateless_stateful_faulty_ticket
  144:     ].
  145: 
  146: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
  147:     catch crypto:stop(),
  148:     try crypto:start() of
  149: 	ok ->
  150: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  151:             ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
  152:     catch _:_ ->
  153: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  154:     end.
  155: 
  156: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  157:     ssl:stop(),
  158:     application:stop(crypto).
  159: 
  160: init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  161:     when GroupName == stateful
  162:          orelse GroupName == stateless
  163:          orelse GroupName == stateful_with_cert
  164:          orelse GroupName == stateless_with_cert ->
  165:     [{server_ticket_mode, GroupName} | proplists:delete(server_ticket_mode, Config)];
  166: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  167:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  168: 
  169: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  170:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  171: 
  172: init_per_testcase(_, Config)  ->
  173:     ssl:stop(),
  174:     application:load(ssl),
  175:     ssl:start(),
  176:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  177:     Config.
  178: 
  179: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  180:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
  181:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_lifetime),
  182:     Config.
  183: 
  184: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  185: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  186: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  187: 
  188: basic() ->
  189:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  190: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  192:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  193:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  194:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  195: 
  196:     %% Configure session tickets
  197:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  198:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  199:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  200:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  201: 
  202:     Server0 =
  203: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  204: 				   {from, self()},
  205: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  206:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  207:                                           [false]}},
  208: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  209:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  210: 
  211:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  212:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  213:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  214:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
  215:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  216:                                                 [false]}},
  217:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  218:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  219: 
  220:     Server0 ! get_socket,
  221:     SSocket0 =
  222:         receive
  223:             {Server0, {socket, Socket0}} ->
  224:                 Socket0
  225:         end,
  226: 
  227:     {ok, ClientCert} = ssl:peercert(SSocket0),
  228: 
  229:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  230:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  231:                               [true]}}},
  232: 
  233:     %% Wait for session ticket
  234:     ct:sleep(100),
  235: 
  236:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  237: 
  238:     %% Use ticket
  239:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  240:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  241:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  242:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  243:                                                 [true]}},
  244:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  245:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
  246: 
  247:     Server0 ! get_socket,
  248:     SSocket1 =
  249:         receive
  250:             {Server0, {socket, Socket1}} ->
  251:                 Socket1
  252:         end,
  253: 
  254:     ExpectedPeercert = case ServerTicketMode of
  255:                            stateful_with_cert -> {ok, ClientCert};
  256:                            stateless_with_cert -> {ok, ClientCert};
  257:                            _ -> {error, no_peercert}
  258:                        end,
  259: 
  260:     ExpectedPeercert = ssl:peercert(SSocket1),
  261: 
  262:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  263:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  264:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  265: 
  266: ticketage_smaller_than_windowsize_anti_replay() ->
  267:     [{doc, "Session resumption with stateless tickets and anti_replay enabled."
  268:       "ClientHello with DeltaAge smaller than Bloom filter window size - fresh ClientHello."
  269:       "DeltaAge treated as particular ClientHello adjective, calculated "
  270:       "as a difference between RealAge and ReportedAge of a ticket used in ClientHello."
  271:       "Ticket age smaller than windowsize."
  272:       "(Erlang client - Erlang server)"}].
  273: ticketage_smaller_than_windowsize_anti_replay(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  274:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts} =
  275:         anti_replay_helper_init(Config, auto, 10),
  276:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  277:     Client1 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  278:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts, 0, true),
  279:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  280:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server0, Client0, Client1]].
  281: 
  282: ticketage_bigger_than_windowsize_anti_replay() ->
  283:     [{doc, "Session resumption with stateless tickets and anti_replay enabled."
  284:       "Fresh ClientHellos."
  285:       "Ticket age bigger than windowsize. 0-RTT is expected to succeed."
  286:       "(Erlang client - Erlang server)"}].
  287: ticketage_bigger_than_windowsize_anti_replay(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  288:     WindowSize = 3,
  289:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts} =
  290:         anti_replay_helper_init(Config, auto, WindowSize),
  291:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  292:     Client1 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  293:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts,
  294:                                          {seconds, WindowSize + 2}, true),
  295:     Client2 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  296:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts,
  297:                                          {seconds, 2*WindowSize + 2}, true),
  298:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  299:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server0, Client0, Client1, Client2]].
  300: 
  301: ticketage_out_of_lifetime_anti_replay() ->
  302:     [{doc, "Session resumption with stateless tickets and anti_replay enabled."
  303:       "Fresh ClientHello."
  304:       "Ticket age beyond its lifetime. 0-RTT is expected to fail."
  305:       "(Erlang client - Erlang server)"}].
  306: ticketage_out_of_lifetime_anti_replay(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  307:     Lifetime = 4,
  308:     WindowSize = 2,
  309:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts} =
  310:         anti_replay_helper_init(Config, auto, WindowSize, Lifetime),
  311:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  312:     Client1 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  313:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts,
  314:                                          {seconds, Lifetime + 2}, false),
  315:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  316:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server0, Client0, Client1]].
  317: 
  318: ticket_reuse_anti_replay() ->
  319:     [{doc, "Verify that 2 connection attempts with same stateless tickets "
  320:       "are successful."
  321:       "Fresh ClientHellos."
  322:       "Ticket age smaller than windowsize."
  323:       "Anti_replay allows it because both "
  324:       "ClientHellos are unique, look fresh(small enough DeltaAge) "
  325:       "and do not look like a replay attempt."
  326:       "(Erlang client - Erlang server)"}].
  327: ticket_reuse_anti_replay(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  328:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts0} =
  329:         anti_replay_helper_init(Config, manual, 10),
  330:     [Ticket] = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  331:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  332:     ClientOpts1 = [{use_ticket, [Ticket]} | ClientOpts0],
  333:     Client1 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  334:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts1, 0, true),
  335:     Client2 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client1, Port0, ClientNode,
  336:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts1, 0, true),
  337:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  338:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server0, Client0, Client2]].
  339: 
  340: ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart() ->
  341:     [{doc, "Verify 2 connection attempts with same stateless tickets "
  342:       "and server restart between. Second attempt is expected to fail as long as "
  343:       "Bloom filter window overlaps with startup time."
  344:       "Fresh ClientHellos."
  345:       "(Erlang client - Erlang server)"
  346: 
  347:       "RFC8446 8.2: When implementations are freshly started, they SHOULD reject "
  348:       "0-RTT as long as any portion of their recording window overlaps the startup "
  349:       "time. Otherwise, they run the risk of accepting replays which were "
  350:       "originally sent during that period."
  351:      }].
  352: ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  353:     WindowSize = 10,
  354:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts0} =
  355:         anti_replay_helper_init(Config, manual, WindowSize),
  356:     [Ticket] = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  357:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  358:     ClientOpts1 = [{use_ticket, [Ticket]} | ClientOpts0],
  359:     Client1 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode,
  360:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts1, 0, true),
  361:     {Server1, Port1} = anti_replay_helper_start_server(Config, WindowSize),
  362:     Client2 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server1, Client1, Port1, ClientNode,
  363:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts1, 0, false, false),
  364:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  365:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server0, Client2, Server1]].
  366: 
  367: ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart_reused_seed() ->
  368:     [{doc, "Verify 2 connection attempts with same stateless tickets "
  369:       "and server restart between, with the server using the same session "
  370:       "ticket encryption seed between restarts. Second attempt is expected to "
  371:       "fail as long as the Bloom filter window overlaps with startup time."
  372:      }].
  373: ticket_reuse_anti_replay_server_restart_reused_seed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  374:     WindowSize = 10,
  375:     Seed = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(32),
  376:     Config1 = [{server_ticket_seed, Seed} | Config],
  377:     {Server1 , Port1} = anti_replay_helper_start_server(Config1, WindowSize),
  378:     {ClientNode, _ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  379:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  380:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  381:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts0],
  382:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  383:                                          {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
  384:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% full handshake
  385:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  386:                                                 [false, wait_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  387:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  388:     [Ticket] = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client1),
  389:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok),
  390:     ClientOpts2 = [{use_ticket, [Ticket]} | ClientOpts1],
  391:     {Server2, Port2} = anti_replay_helper_start_server(Config1, WindowSize),
  392:     Client2 = anti_replay_helper_connect(Server2, Client1, Port2, ClientNode,
  393:                                          Hostname, ClientOpts2, 0, false, false),
  394:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  395:     [ssl_test_lib:close(A) || A <- [Server1, Client2, Server2]].
  396: 
  397: anti_replay_helper_init(Config, Mode, WindowSize) ->
  398:     DefaultLifetime = ssl_config:get_ticket_lifetime(),
  399:     anti_replay_helper_init(Config, Mode, WindowSize, DefaultLifetime).
  400: 
  401: anti_replay_helper_init(Config, Mode, WindowSize, Lifetime) ->
  402:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_lifetime, Lifetime),
  403:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  404:     {ClientNode, _ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  405:     %% Configure session tickets
  406:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, Mode},
  407:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts0],
  408: 
  409:     {Server0 , Port0} = anti_replay_helper_start_server(Config, WindowSize),
  410:     MFA = case Mode of
  411:               auto ->
  412:                   {ssl_test_lib,
  413:                    verify_active_session_resumption,
  414:                    [false]};
  415:               manual ->
  416:                   {ssl_test_lib,
  417:                    verify_active_session_resumption,
  418:                    [false, wait_reply, {tickets, 1}]}
  419:           end,
  420: 
  421:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  422:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  423:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  424:                                          {mfa, MFA},
  425:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  426:     {Server0, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname, ClientOpts}.
  427: 
  428: anti_replay_helper_start_server(Config, WindowSize) ->
  429:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  430:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  431:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  432:     ServerTicketSeed =
  433:         case proplists:get_value(server_ticket_seed, Config) of
  434:             undefined ->
  435:                 [];
  436:             Seed ->
  437:                 [{stateless_tickets_seed, Seed}]
  438:         end,
  439:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  440:                   {anti_replay, {WindowSize, 5, 72985}},
  441:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0
  442:                  ] ++ ServerTicketSeed,
  443: 
  444:     Server =
  445: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  446: 				   {from, self()},
  447: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  448:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  449:                                           [false]}},
  450: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  451:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  452:     {Server, Port0}.
  453: 
  454: anti_replay_helper_connect(Server, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname,
  455:                            ClientOpts, Delay, ExpectedResumption) ->
  456:     anti_replay_helper_connect(Server, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname,
  457:                                ClientOpts, Delay, ExpectedResumption, true).
  458: 
  459: anti_replay_helper_connect(Server, Client0, Port0, ClientNode, Hostname,
  460:                            ClientOpts, Delay, ExpectedResumption, SendListen) ->
  461:     case SendListen of
  462:         true ->
  463:             Server ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  464:                                      verify_active_session_resumption,
  465:                                      [ExpectedResumption]}}};
  466:         _ ->
  467:             ok
  468:     end,
  469: 
  470:     %% Wait for session ticket
  471:     ct:sleep(100),
  472:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  473:     ct:sleep(Delay),
  474:     %% Use ticket
  475:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  476:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  477:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  478:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  479:                                                 [ExpectedResumption]}},
  480:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  481:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client1, ok),
  482:     Client1.
  483: 
  484: basic_stateful_stateless() ->
  485:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  486: basic_stateful_stateless(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  487:     do_test_mixed(Config,
  488:                   [{session_tickets, auto},
  489:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
  490:                   [{session_tickets, stateful},
  491:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
  492:                   [{session_tickets, stateless},
  493:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}]).
  494:

  538:                                  <<"faulty ticket">>]},
  539:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],

  548: basic_stateless_stateful_faulty_ticket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->

  552:                   [{session_tickets, manual},
  553:                    {use_ticket, [<<"faulty ticket">>,
  554:                                  <<131,100,0,12,"faultyticket">>]},
  555:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}],
  556:                   [{session_tickets, stateless},
  557:                    {anti_replay, '10k'},

  559:                   [{session_tickets, stateful},
  560:                    {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}]).

  562: hello_retry_request() ->
  563:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with session tickets and hello_retry_request (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  564: hello_retry_request(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  566:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  567:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  568:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  569:     
  570:     %% Configure session tickets
  571:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
  572:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  573:                   {supported_groups,[secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
  574:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  575:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  576:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
  577: 
  578:     Server0 =
  579: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  580: 				   {from, self()},
  581: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  582:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  583:                                           [false]}},
  584: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  585:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  586: 
  587:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  588:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  589:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  590:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  591:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  592:                                                 [false]}},
  593:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  594:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  595: 
  596:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  597:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  598:                               [true]}}},
  599: 
  600:     %% Wait for session ticket
  601:     ct:sleep(100),
  602: 
  603:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  604: 
  605:     %% Use ticket
  606:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  607:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  608:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  609:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  610:                                                 [true]}},
  611:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
  612:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
  613: 
  614:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  615:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  616:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  617: 
  618: multiple_tickets() ->
  619:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with multiple session tickets (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  620: multiple_tickets(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  621:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  622:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  623:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  624:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  625: 
  626:     %% Configure session tickets
  627:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, manual},
  628:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  629:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  630:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  631: 
  632:     Server0 =
  633: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  634: 				   {from, self()},
  635: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  636:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  637:                                           [false]}},
  638: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  639:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  640: 
  641:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  642:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  643:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  644:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  645:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  646:                                                 [false, wait_reply, {tickets, 3}]}},
  647:                                          {from, self()},  {options, ClientOpts}]),
  648: 
  649:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  650: 
  651:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  652: 
  653:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  654: 
  655:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  656:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  657:                               [true]}}},
  658: 
  659:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  660: 
  661:     %% Use ticket
  662:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  663:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  664:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  665:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  666:                                                 [true, wait_reply, no_tickets]}},
  667:                                          {from, self()},
  668:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts]}]),
  669: 
  670:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
  671: 
  672:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  673:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  674:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  675: 
  676: multiple_tickets_2hash() ->
  677:     [{doc,"Test session resumption with multiple session tickets with 2 different hash algorithms (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  678: multiple_tickets_2hash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  679:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  680:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  681:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  682:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  683:     
  684:     %% Configure session tickets
  685:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, manual},
  686:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  687:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode},
  688:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  689: 
  690:     Server0 =
  691: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  692: 				   {from, self()},
  693: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  694:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  695:                                           [false]}},
  696: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  697:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  698: 
  699:     %% Get tickets using sha256
  700:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  701:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  702:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  703:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  704:                                                 [false, wait_reply, {tickets, 3}]}},
  705:                                          {from, self()},
  706:                                          {options, [{ciphers, [#{key_exchange => any,
  707:                                                                  cipher => aes_128_gcm,
  708:                                                                  mac => aead,
  709:                                                                  prf => sha256}]}| ClientOpts]}]),
  710: 
  711:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  712: 
  713:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets0]),
  714: 
  715:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  716: 
  717:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  718:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  719:                               [false]}}},
  720: 
  721:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  722: 
  723:     %% Get tickets using sha384
  724:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  725:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  726:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  727:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  728:                                                 [false, wait_reply, {tickets, 3}]}},
  729:                                          {from, self()},
  730:                                          {options, [{ciphers, [#{key_exchange => any,
  731:                                                                  cipher => aes_256_gcm,
  732:                                                                  mac => aead,
  733:                                                                  prf => sha384}]}| ClientOpts]}]),
  734: 
  735:     Tickets1 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client1),
  736: 
  737:     ?CT_LOG("Received tickets: ~p~n", [Tickets1]),
  738: 
  739:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok),
  740: 
  741:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  742:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  743:                               [true]}}},
  744: 
  745:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1),
  746: 
  747:     %% Use tickets for handshake (server chooses TLS_AES_256_GCM_SHA384 cipher suite)
  748:     Client2 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  749:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  750:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  751:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  752:                                                 [true]}},
  753:                                          {from, self()},
  754:                                          {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0 ++ Tickets1}|ClientOpts]}]),
  755:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client2, ok),
  756: 
  757:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  758:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  759:                               [true]}}},
  760: 
  761:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client2),
  762: 
  763:     %% Use tickets for handshake (client chooses TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 cipher suite)
  764:     Client3 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  765:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  766:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  767:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  768:                                                 [true]}},
  769:                                          {from, self()},
  770:                                          {options, [{ciphers, [#{key_exchange => any,
  771:                                                                  cipher => chacha20_poly1305,
  772:                                                                  mac => aead,
  773:                                                                  prf => sha256}]},
  774:                                                     {use_ticket, Tickets0 ++ Tickets1}|ClientOpts]}]),
  775:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client3, ok),
  776: 
  777:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  778:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  779:                               [false]}}},
  780: 
  781:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client3),
  782: 
  783:     %% Use tickets (created using sha384) for handshake (client chooses
  784:     %% TLS_CHACHA20_POLY1305_SHA256 cipher suite).
  785:     %% Session resumption should fail as chosen cipher suite uses different hash algorithms
  786:     %% than those supplied by the selected tickets.
  787:     Client4 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  788:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  789:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  790:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  791:                                                 [false]}},
  792:                                          {from, self()},
  793:                                          {options, [{ciphers, [#{key_exchange => any,
  794:                                                                  cipher => chacha20_poly1305,
  795:                                                                  mac => aead,
  796:                                                                  prf => sha256}]},
  797:                                                     {use_ticket, Tickets1}|ClientOpts]}]),
  798:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client4, ok),
  799: 
  800:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client4),
  801: 
  802:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  803:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0).
  804: 
  805: early_data_trial_decryption() ->
  806:     [{doc,"Test trial decryption when server rejects early data (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  807: early_data_trial_decryption(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  808:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  809:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  810:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  811:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  812: 
  813:     %% Configure session tickets
  814:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
  815:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  816:     %% Send maximum sized early data to verify calculation of plain text size
  817:     %% in the server.
  818:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384)}|ClientOpts1],
  819: 
  820:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
  821:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, disabled},
  822:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  823: 
  824:     Server0 =
  825: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  826: 				   {from, self()},
  827: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  828:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  829:                                           [false]}},
  830: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  831:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  832: 
  833:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  834:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  835:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  836:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
  837:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  838:                                                 [false]}},
  839:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  840:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  841: 
  842:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  843:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  844:                               [true]}}},
  845: 
  846:     %% Wait for session ticket
  847:     ct:sleep(100),
  848: 
  849:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  850: 
  851:     %% Use ticket
  852:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  853:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  854:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  855:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  856:                                                 [true]}},
  857:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts2}]),
  858:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
  859: 
  860:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  861:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
  862:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
  863: 
  864: early_data_client_too_much_data() ->
  865:     [{doc,"Client sending too much early data (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  866: early_data_client_too_much_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  867:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  868:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  869:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  870:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  871: 
  872:     %% Configure session tickets
  873:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  874:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  875:     %% Send more early data than max_early_data_size to verify calculation
  876:     %% of plain text size in the server.
  877:     MaxEarlyDataSize = 10000,
  878:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384)}|ClientOpts1],
  879: 
  880:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, disabled},
  881:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  882: 
  883:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data, MaxEarlyDataSize),
  884:     Server0 =
  885: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  886: 				   {from, self()},
  887: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  888:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  889:                                           [false]}},
  890: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  891:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
  892:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  893: 
  894:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  895:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  896:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  897:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
  898:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  899:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  900:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  901:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  902:     ssl_test_lib:verify_session_ticket_extension(Tickets0, MaxEarlyDataSize),
  903:     %% ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  904: 
  905:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  906:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  907:                               [false, no_reply]}}},
  908: 
  909:     %% Wait for session ticket
  910:     ct:sleep(100),
  911: 
  912:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  913: 
  914:     %% Use ticket
  915:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  916:                                                {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  917:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  918:                                                       verify_active_session_resumption,
  919:                                                       [false, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  920:                                                {from, self()}, {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets0}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  921:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client1, illegal_parameter),
  922:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  923:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0).
  924: 
  925: early_data_trial_decryption_failure() ->
  926:     [{doc,"Emulate faulty client that sends too much early data (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  927: early_data_trial_decryption_failure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  929:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  930:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  931:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
  932: 
  933:     %% Configure session tickets
  934:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
  935:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
  936:     %% Send more early data than max_early_data_size to verify calculation
  937:     %% of plain text size in the server.
  938:     MaxEarlyDataSize = 10000,
  939:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16385)}|ClientOpts1],
  940: 
  941:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
  942:     %% up to the configured amount. If more data is received the server triggers
  943:     %% a bad_record_mac alert.
  944:     %% It is not possible to trigger this condition in normal use cases:
  945:     %%  - The ssl client in auto mode has a built in protection against sending
  946:     %%    too much early data. It will not send any early data.
  947:     %%  - The ssl client in manual mode can only send the mount that is received
  948:     %%    in the ticket used for the 0-RTT handshake. If more data is sent the
  949:     %%    client will trigger an illegal_parameter alert (too_much_early_data).
  950:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, disabled},
  951:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
  952: 
  953:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data, MaxEarlyDataSize),
  954:     Server0 =
  955: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  956: 				   {from, self()},
  957: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  958:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
  959:                                           [false]}},
  960: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
  961:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
  962: 
  963:     %% Store ticket from first connection
  964:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  965:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  966:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
  967:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
  968:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
  969:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
  970:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
  971:     %% Simulate a faulty client by updating the max_early_data_size extension in
  972:     %% the received session ticket
  973:     Tickets1 = ssl_test_lib:update_session_ticket_extension(Tickets0, 16385),
  974:     %% ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
  975: 
  976:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  977:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
  978:                               [false, no_reply]}}},
  979: 
  980:     %% Wait for session ticket
  981:     ct:sleep(100),
  982: 
  983:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  984: 
  985:     %% Use ticket
  986:     _Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
  987:                                                {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
  988:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
  989:                                                       verify_active_session_resumption,
  990:                                                       [false, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
  991:                                                {from, self()}, {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets1}|ClientOpts2]}]),
  992:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server0, bad_record_mac),
  993:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  994:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
  995:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0).
  996: 
  997: early_data_decryption_failure() ->
  998:     [{doc,"Emulate faulty client that sends too much early data - server early_data enabled (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
  999: early_data_decryption_failure(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1000:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1001:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1002:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1003:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
 1004: 
 1005:     %% Configure session tickets
 1006:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, manual},
 1007:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1008:     %% Send more early data than max_early_data_size to verify calculation
 1009:     %% of plain text size in the server.
 1010:     MaxEarlyDataSize = 10000,
 1011:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16385)}|ClientOpts1],
 1012: 
 1013:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, enabled},
 1014:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1015: 
 1016:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data, MaxEarlyDataSize),
 1017:     Server0 =
 1018: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1019: 				   {from, self()},
 1020: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1021:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1022:                                           [false]}},
 1023: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1024:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1025: 
 1026:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1027:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1028:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1029:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1030:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1031:                                                 [false, no_reply, {tickets, 1}]}},
 1032:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1033:     Tickets0 = ssl_test_lib:check_tickets(Client0),
 1034:     %% Simulate a faulty client by updating the max_early_data_size extension in
 1035:     %% the received session ticket
 1036:     Tickets1 = ssl_test_lib:update_session_ticket_extension(Tickets0, 16385),
 1037:     %% ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1038: 
 1039:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1040:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
 1041:                               [false, no_reply]}}},
 1042: 
 1043:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1044:     ct:sleep(100),
 1045: 
 1046:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1047: 
 1048:     %% Use ticket
 1049:     _Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},
 1050:                                                {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1051:                                                {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1052:                                                       verify_active_session_resumption,
 1053:                                                       [false, no_reply, no_tickets]}},
 1054:                                                {from, self()}, {options, [{use_ticket, Tickets1}|ClientOpts2]}]),
 1055:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server0, unexpected_message),
 1056:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1057:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
 1058:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0).
 1059: 
 1060: early_data_disabled_small_limit() ->
 1061:     [{doc,"Test trial decryption when server rejects early data (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
 1062: early_data_disabled_small_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1063:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1064:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1065:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1066:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
 1067: 
 1068:     %% Configure session tickets
 1069:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
 1070:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1071:     %% Send maximum sized early data to verify calculation of plain text size
 1072:     %% in the server.
 1073:     MaxEarlyDataSize = 5,
 1074:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 4)}|ClientOpts1],
 1075: 
 1076:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
 1077:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, disabled},
 1078:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1079:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data, MaxEarlyDataSize),
 1080:     Server0 =
 1081: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1082: 				   {from, self()},
 1083: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1084:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1085:                                           [false]}},
 1086: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1087:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1088: 
 1089:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1090:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1091:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1092:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1093:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1094:                                                 [false]}},
 1095:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1096:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1097: 
 1098:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1099:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
 1100:                               [true]}}},
 1101: 
 1102:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1103:     ct:sleep(100),
 1104: 
 1105:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1106: 
 1107:     %% Use ticket
 1108:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1109:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1110:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1111:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1112:                                                 [true]}},
 1113:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts2}]),
 1114:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
 1115: 
 1116:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1117:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
 1118:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1119:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
 1120: 
 1121: early_data_enabled_small_limit() ->
 1122:     [{doc,"Test decryption when server accepts early data (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
 1123: early_data_enabled_small_limit(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1124:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1125:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1126:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1127:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
 1128: 
 1129:     %% Configure session tickets
 1130:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
 1131:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1132:     %% Send maximum sized early data to verify calculation of plain text size
 1133:     %% in the server.
 1134:     MaxEarlyDataSize = 5,
 1135:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 4)}|ClientOpts1],
 1136: 
 1137:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
 1138:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, enabled},
 1139:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1140:     application:set_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data, MaxEarlyDataSize),
 1141:     Server0 =
 1142: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1143: 				   {from, self()},
 1144: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1145:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1146:                                           [false]}},
 1147: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1148:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1149: 
 1150:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1151:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1152:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1153:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1154:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1155:                                                 [false]}},
 1156:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1157:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1158: 
 1159:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1160:                               verify_active_session_resumption,
 1161:                               [true]}}},
 1162: 
 1163:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1164:     ct:sleep(100),
 1165: 
 1166:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1167: 
 1168:     %% Use ticket
 1169:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1170:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1171:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1172:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1173:                                                 [true]}},
 1174:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts2}]),
 1175:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
 1176: 
 1177:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1178:     application:unset_env(ssl, server_session_ticket_max_early_data),
 1179:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1180:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
 1181: 
 1182: early_data_basic() ->
 1183:     [{doc,"Test early data when client is not authenticated (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
 1184: early_data_basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1185:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1186:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1187:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1188:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
 1189: 
 1190:     %% Configure session tickets
 1191:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
 1192:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1193:     %% Send maximum sized early data to verify calculation of plain text size
 1194:     %% in the server.
 1195:     EarlyData = binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384),
 1196:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384)}|ClientOpts1],
 1197: 
 1198:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
 1199:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, enabled},
 1200:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1201: 
 1202:     Server0 =
 1203: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1204: 				   {from, self()},
 1205: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1206:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1207:                                           [false]}},
 1208: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1209:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1210: 
 1211:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1212:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1213:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1214:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1215:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1216:                                                 [false]}},
 1217:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1218:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1219: 
 1220:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1221:                               verify_server_early_data,
 1222:                               [wait_reply, EarlyData]}}},
 1223: 
 1224:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1225:     ct:sleep(100),
 1226: 
 1227:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1228: 
 1229:     %% Use ticket
 1230:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1231:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1232:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1233:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1234:                                                 [true]}},
 1235:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts2}]),
 1236:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
 1237: 
 1238:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1239:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1240:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
 1241: 
 1242: early_data_basic_auth() ->
 1243:     [{doc,"Test early data when client is authenticated (erlang client - erlang server)"}].
 1244: early_data_basic_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1245:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1246:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1247:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1248:     ServerTicketMode = proplists:get_value(server_ticket_mode, Config),
 1249: 
 1250:     %% Configure session tickets
 1251:     ClientOpts1 = [{session_tickets, auto},
 1252:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1253:     %% Send maximum sized early data to verify calculation of plain text size
 1254:     %% in the server.
 1255:     EarlyData = binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384),
 1256:     ClientOpts2 = [{early_data, binary:copy(<<"F">>, 16384)}|ClientOpts1],
 1257: 
 1258:     %% Disabled early data triggers trial decryption upon receiving early data
 1259:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, ServerTicketMode}, {early_data, enabled},
 1260:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1261: 
 1262:     Server0 =
 1263: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1264: 				   {from, self()},
 1265: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1266:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1267:                                           [false]}},
 1268: 				   {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1269:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1270: 
 1271:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1272:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1273:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1274:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1275:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1276:                                                 [false]}},
 1277:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1278:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1279: 
 1280:     Server0 ! {listen, {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1281:                               verify_server_early_data,
 1282:                               [wait_reply, EarlyData]}}},
 1283: 
 1284:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1285:     ct:sleep(100),
 1286: 
 1287:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1288: 
 1289:     %% TODO This test should fail!
 1290:     %% State transition is not implemented from wait_eoed to wait_cert!
 1291:     %% Use ticket
 1292:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1293:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1294:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1295:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1296:                                                 [true]}},
 1297:                                          {from, self()},
 1298:                                          {options,
 1299:                                           proplists:delete(keyfile,
 1300:                                                            proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts2))}]),
 1301:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client1, ok),
 1302: 
 1303:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1304:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1305:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
 1306: 
 1307: stateless_multiple_servers() ->
 1308:     [{doc, "Test session resumption with session tickets, resuming on different server"}].
 1309: stateless_multiple_servers(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1310:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1311:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1312:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1313: 
 1314:     Seed = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(64),
 1315: 
 1316:     %% Configure session tickets
 1317:     ClientOpts = [{session_tickets, auto},
 1318:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts0],
 1319:     ServerOpts = [{session_tickets, stateless},
 1320:                   {stateless_tickets_seed, Seed},
 1321:                   {versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1322: 
 1323:     Server0 =
 1324:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1325:                                    {from, self()},
 1326:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1327:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1328:                                           [false]}},
 1329:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1330:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1331: 
 1332:     Server1 =
 1333:         ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1334:                                    {from, self()},
 1335:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1336:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1337:                                           [true]}},
 1338:                                    {options, ServerOpts}]),
 1339:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 1340: 
 1341:     %% Store ticket from first connection to server 0
 1342:     Client0 =
 1343:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1344:                                    {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1345:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1346:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1347:                                           [false]}},
 1348:                                    {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1349:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1350: 
 1351:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1352:     ct:sleep(100),
 1353: 
 1354:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1355: 
 1356:     %% Use ticket when connecting to server 1
 1357:     Client1 =
 1358:         ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1359:                                    {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 1360:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1361:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1362:                                           [true]}},
 1363:                                    {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts}]),
 1364:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 1365: 
 1366:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1367:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1368:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 1369:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
 1370: 
 1371: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1372: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1373: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1374: 
 1375: do_test_mixed(Config, COpts, SOpts1, SOpts2) when is_list(Config) ->
 1376:     do_test_mixed(Config, COpts, COpts, SOpts1, SOpts2).
 1377: %%
 1378: do_test_mixed(Config, COpts1, COpts2, SOpts1, SOpts2) when is_list(Config) ->
 1379:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1380:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
 1381:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
 1382: 
 1383:     %% Configure session tickets
 1384:     ClientOpts1 = COpts1 ++ ClientOpts0,
 1385:     ServerOpts1 = SOpts1 ++ ServerOpts0,
 1386: 
 1387:     Server0 =
 1388: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1389: 				   {from, self()},
 1390: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1391:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1392:                                           [false]}},
 1393: 				   {options, ServerOpts1}]),
 1394:     Port0 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server0),
 1395: 
 1396:     %% Store ticket from first connection
 1397:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1398:                                          {port, Port0}, {host, Hostname},
 1399:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Full handshake
 1400:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1401:                                                 [false]}},
 1402:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts1}]),
 1403:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server0, ok, Client0, ok),
 1404: 
 1405:     %% Wait for session ticket
 1406:     ct:sleep(100),
 1407: 
 1408:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
 1409:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server0),
 1410: 
 1411:     ClientOpts2 = COpts2 ++ ClientOpts0,
 1412:     ServerOpts2 = SOpts2 ++ ServerOpts0,
 1413: 
 1414:     Server1 =
 1415: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
 1416: 				   {from, self()},
 1417: 				   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
 1418:                                           verify_active_session_resumption,
 1419:                                           [false]}},
 1420: 				   {options, ServerOpts2}]),
 1421:     Port1 = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server1),
 1422: 
 1423:     %% Use ticket
 1424:     Client1 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
 1425:                                          {port, Port1}, {host, Hostname},
 1426:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  %% Short handshake
 1427:                                                 verify_active_session_resumption,
 1428:                                                 [false]}},
 1429:                                          {from, self()}, {options, ClientOpts2}]),
 1430:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server1, ok, Client1, ok),
 1431: 
 1432:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
 1433:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server1),
 1434:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client1).
